subroutine set_constant_dispersion (coefficient)
 Set dispersion coefficient interface to an implementation that is constant in space and time This routine sets the value of the constant dispersion coefficient as well.

procedure(diffusion_coef_if),
pointer 		dispersion_coef = > null()
 This pointer should be set by the driver or client code to specify the treatment at the dispersion coefficients.
real(stm_real), save const_dispersion

Detailed Description

Dispersion coefficient interface to be fulfilled by driver or application.

Member Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine dispersion_coefficient::constant_dispersion_coef ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(out)  disp_coef_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  flow_hi,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
integer, intent(in)  nvar 
)

Implementation of diffusion_coef_if that sets dipsersion to a constant over space and time.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step
[in]flow_loflow on lo side of cells centered in time
[in]flow_hiflow on hi side of cells centered in time
[in]flowflow on center of cells
[out]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef.
[out]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef.
subroutine dispersion_coefficient::set_constant_dispersion ( real(stm_real), intent(in)  coefficient)

Set dispersion coefficient interface to an implementation that is constant in space and time This routine sets the value of the constant dispersion coefficient as well.

Parameters:
[in]coefficientConstant value of dispersion coef.
